article: Mr Zhou and his students are on the bus. Everyone is  _  . They'll arrive in Shanghai. Now, they are  _  their way to their sister school by  _  . The school is not far  _  their hotel. Mr. Zhou becomes more excited. He is from Shanghai. His parents and his friends will be glad  to see  him. He and his students are talking  _  their plan in the bus. First, they will study in their sister school  _  months and then they will see some  _  places in Shanghai. About four months  _  , they'll go  back to  Nanjing.
